# informativeText

**Instance Property**

Additional text that the template displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var informativeText: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to display additional information about the contact. For example, their address or a short bio.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0].

## Configuring the Contact’s Attributes

- **image**: The contact’s image.
- **name**: The contact’s name.
- **subtitle**: A subtitle that the template displays in addition to the contact’s name.

items.description: A subtitle that the template displays in addition to the contact’s name.
